1
Created a comprehensive supply management model to help generate purchase 
orders  and prevent out of stock (OOS) situations and improve service levels
Specialty Food Manufacturer
(Material Requirement Planning)

ORDER PLANNING FOR PE-OWNED SPECIALITY FOOD MANUFACTURER
SITUATION
▪Recently implemented ERP system was not a good fit for the company’s business processes. Hence, the purchase orders  generated from the system were 
not optimum leading to frequent stock outs and low service levels
▪Merilytics partnered with the company to create a comprehensive supply management model to help generate purchase orders  and prevent out of 
stock (OOS) situations, and improve service levels
▪Created an easy-to-use supply management model customized to suit the company’s unique requirements
▪Estimated the net product needs of the company by taking into consideration the demand forecast, future product expirations, safety stock and open purchase 
orders (POs)
▪Generated the purchase orders to be placed based on the supplier lead time, supplier cycle time  and net product needs
VALUE ADDITION
IMPACT
▪The customized supply management model helped the company to improve their PO placing activities leading to higher service levels
ABOUT THE CLIENT
Company was a PE-owned specialty food manufacturer
